long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Briefly is a Chrome extension developed by Deyaan Priyani as part of his research at the University of Houston-Victoria under the guidance of Mr. Maulin Raval and Dr. Hardik Gohel at the Applied AI lab. Designed to streamline information consumption for high school and college students, Briefly efficiently extracts the core concepts and main ideas from articles, research papers, and even complex instructions.

Leveraging the power of the Textrank JavaScript algorithm, combined with browser APIs and foundational web development techniques, Briefly offers a rapid and reliable text summarization solution. By transforming dense text into concise summaries, the extension aims to enhance students' comprehension and study efficiency.

Essential Features:
- 750+ word limit box 
- 15% summarized summary (provided by textrank)
- Appealing UI/UX 

Version: v1.1-beta 

Future: 
- 2500+ word limit
- Summary, tone, and format adjustments
- Multi-Language Support

Backend + Frontend:
- Vanilla Javascript
- Tailwind CSS
- Textrank Algorithm
